subject: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$451,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://doubleransalt.com/
